parts.contentJson: {"text":"I'll create a modern robot control dashboard UI with interactive controls, status monitoring, and a visual robot display.","textMode":"visible_message"}

{"text":"The user is asking for a "robot UI". This is a very brief request, so I need to interpret what they want. They likely want a user interface related to robots - this could be:
1. A robot control panel
2. A robot dashboard
3. A chatbot interface
4. A robotic assistant UI
5. A futuristic robot-themed interface

Given the brevity, I'll create something visually interesting and functional - perhaps a robot control dashboard or a robot assistant interface with a modern, tech-forward design.

Let me classify this request:
- No mention of external APIs, Supabase, or backend
- No requirement for server-side persistence
- This can be purely frontend

Classification: **PureFrontend**

I'll create a robot control/monitoring dashboard UI with:
- A visual robot representation
- Control panel
- Status monitoring
- Interactive controls
- Modern, tech-forward design

Let me start by checking the current file structure and then build the application.","signature":""}

{"toolCallId":"toolu_01XRDKAHTSjGAqny2GafMMmP","toolName":"think","argsJson":"{\"thought\":\"I can see lucide-react is already installed, which is perfect for icons. I'll create a robot control dashboard UI with:\\n1. A visual robot representation using SVG\\n2. Control panels with sliders and buttons\\n3. Status indicators\\n4. Real-time monitoring gauges\\n5. Command buttons\\n\\nI'll create components for:\\n- RobotDisplay - the visual robot\\n- ControlPanel - with various controls\\n- StatusPanel - showing robot stats\\n- CommandCenter - action buttons\\n\\nLet me start creating the components.\\n\"}"}

{"toolCallId":"toolu_01FEnrfyJNuJnG6zVGHoQfez","toolName":"write_tool","argsJson":"{\"path\":\"/src/app/components/CommandCenter.tsx\",\"file_text\":\"import { Button } from './ui/button';\\nimport {\\n Play,\\n Pause,\\n RotateCcw,\\n Home,\\n MapPin,\\n Camera,\\n Shield,\\n AlertCircle,\\n} from 'lucide-react';\\nimport { toast } from 'sonner';\\n\\ninterface CommandCenterProps {\\n isRunning: boolean;\\n onToggleRunning: () => void;\\n onReset: () => void;\\n}\\n\\nexport function CommandCenter({ isRunning, onToggleRunning, onReset }: CommandCenterProps) {\\n const handleCommand = (command: string) => {\\n toast.success(`Command executed: ${command}`);\\n };\\n\\n return (\\n

{"toolCallId":"toolu_01ShbvsAukjVio2XEn9aw68Y","toolName":"write_tool","argsJson":"{\"path\":\"/src/app/App.tsx\",\"file_text\":\"import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';\\nimport { RobotDisplay } from './components/RobotDisplay';\\nimport { ControlPanel } from './components/ControlPanel';\\nimport { StatusPanel } from './components/StatusPanel';\\nimport { CommandCenter } from './components/CommandCenter';\\nimport { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './components/ui/card';\\nimport { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from './components/ui/tabs';\\nimport { Toaster } from './components/ui/sonner';\\nimport { Bot } from 'lucide-react';\\n\\nexport default function App() {\\n // Control States\\n const [power, setPower] = useState(75);\\n const [speed, setSpeed] = useState(50);\\n const [volume, setVolume] = useState(60);\\n const [sensorsEnabled, setSensorsEnabled] = useState(true);\\n const [isRunning, setIsRunning] = useState(false);\\n\\n // Robot States\\n const [armRotation, setArmRotation] = useState(0);\\n const [headRotation, setHeadRotation] = useState(0);\\n\\n // Status States\\n const [battery, setBattery] = useState(85);\\n const [cpu, setCpu] = useState(45);\\n const [temperature, setTemperature] = useState(38);\\n const [signal, setSignal] = useState(92);\\n\\n // Simulate robot movements\\n useEffect(() => {\\n if (!isRunning || power === 0) return;\\n\\n const interval = setInterval(() => {\\n setArmRotation((prev) => {\\n const newRotation = prev + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10;\\n return Math.max(-30, Math.min(30, newRotation));\\n });\\n\\n setHeadRotation((prev) => {\\n const newRotation = prev + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 8;\\n return Math.max(-25, Math.min(25, newRotation));\\n });\\n }, 1000);\\n\\n return () => clearInterval(interval);\\n }, [isRunning, power]);\\n\\n // Simulate status changes\\n useEffect(() => {\\n if (!isRunning || power === 0) return;\\n\\n const interval = setInterval(() => {\\n setBattery((prev) => Math.max(0, prev - 0.1));\\n setCpu((prev) => Math.min(100, Math.max(20, prev + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10)));\\n setTemperature((prev) => Math.min(100, Math.max(25, prev + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 3)));\\n setSignal((prev) => Math.min(100, Math.max(50, prev + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 5)));\\n }, 2000);\\n\\n return () => clearInterval(interval);\\n }, [isRunning, power]);\\n\\n const handleReset = () => {\\n setPower(75);\\n setSpeed(50);\\n setVolume(60);\\n setSensorsEnabled(true);\\n setIsRunning(false);\\n setArmRotation(0);\\n setHeadRotation(0);\\n setBattery(85);\\n setCpu(45);\\n setTemperature(38);\\n setSignal(92);\\n };\\n\\n return (\\n
\\n \\n \\n
\\n {/* Header */}\\n
\\n
\\n \\n
\\n
\\n

Robot Control Center

\\n

Advanced Robotic Interface v2.0

\\n
\\n
\\n\\n {/* Main Layout */}\\n
\\n {/* Robot Display */}\\n \\n \\n \\n \\n \\n\\n {/* Controls and Status */}\\n
\\n {/* Status Panel */}\\n \\n \\n System Status\\n \\n \\n \\n \\n \\n\\n {/* Command Center */}\\n \\n \\n Commands\\n \\n \\n setIsRunning(!isRunning)}\\n onReset={handleReset}\\n />\\n \\n \\n
\\n
\\n\\n {/* Control Panel */}\\n \\n \\n Control Panel\\n \\n \\n \\n \\n Controls\\n Diagnostics\\n \\n \\n \\n setPower(value[0])}\\n onSpeedChange={(value) => setSpeed(value[0])}\\n onVolumeChange={(value) => setVolume(value[0])}\\n sensorsEnabled={sensorsEnabled}\\n onSensorsToggle={setSensorsEnabled}\\n />\\n \\n \\n \\n
\\n
\\n
UPTIME
\\n
02:34:18
\\n
\\n
\\n
DISTANCE
\\n
1.2 km
\\n
\\n
\\n
MOTOR STATUS
\\n
NOMINAL
\\n
\\n
\\n
SENSORS
\\n
{sensorsEnabled ? 'ACTIVE' : 'INACTIVE'}
\\n
\\n
\\n \\n \\n \\n \\n
\\n
\\n );\\n}\\n\"}"}

{"text":"I've created a fully interactive robot control dashboard UI with real-time monitoring and controls. The interface features an animated robot display that responds to power levels and movements, comprehensive control panels for power/speed/volume, system status monitoring with battery/CPU/temperature/signal indicators, and a command center with play/pause, navigation, and action buttons. The robot animates with arm and head movements when active, and all systems simulate realistic behavior including battery drain and CPU fluctuations.","textMode":"visible_message"}

{"toolCallId":"tooluse_CESbEhRJGZspBjJVpoMuw2","toolName":"write_tool","argsJson":"{\"path\":\"/src/app/components/RGBView.tsx\",\"file_text\":\"import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';\\nimport { Camera } from 'lucide-react';\\n\\ninterface RGBViewProps {\\n isActive: boolean;\\n}\\n\\nexport function RGBView({ isActive }: RGBViewProps) {\\n const canvasRef = useRef(null);\\n\\n useEffect(() => {\\n if (!isActive || !canvasRef.current) return;\\n\\n const canvas = canvasRef.current;\\n const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\\n if (!ctx) return;\\n\\n let animationId: number;\\n let time = 0;\\n\\n const drawRGBScene = () => {\\n // Background gradient\\n const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\\n gradient.addColorStop(0, '#1e293b');\\n gradient.addColorStop(1, '#0f172a');\\n ctx.fillStyle = gradient;\\n ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\\n\\n // Draw grid\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#334155';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 1;\\n for (let i = 0; i < canvas.width; i += 40) {\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(i, 0);\\n ctx.lineTo(i, canvas.height);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n }\\n for (let i = 0; i < canvas.height; i += 40) {\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(0, i);\\n ctx.lineTo(canvas.width, i);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n }\\n\\n // Draw simulated objects with colors\\n const centerX = canvas.width / 2;\\n const centerY = canvas.height / 2;\\n\\n // Object 1 - Blue cube\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#3b82f6';\\n ctx.fillRect(centerX - 80 + Math.sin(time * 0.5) * 10, centerY - 60, 60, 60);\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#60a5fa';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 2;\\n ctx.strokeRect(centerX - 80 + Math.sin(time * 0.5) * 10, centerY - 60, 60, 60);\\n\\n // Object 2 - Green circle\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#10b981';\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.arc(centerX + 50 + Math.cos(time * 0.7) * 10, centerY - 30, 30, 0, Math.PI * 2);\\n ctx.fill();\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#34d399';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 2;\\n ctx.stroke();\\n\\n // Object 3 - Red triangle\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#ef4444';\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(centerX - 20, centerY + 40 + Math.sin(time * 0.3) * 5);\\n ctx.lineTo(centerX - 50, centerY + 80 + Math.sin(time * 0.3) * 5);\\n ctx.lineTo(centerX + 10, centerY + 80 + Math.sin(time * 0.3) * 5);\\n ctx.closePath();\\n ctx.fill();\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#f87171';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 2;\\n ctx.stroke();\\n\\n // Scan line effect\\n const scanY = (time * 50) % canvas.height;\\n ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3)';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 2;\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(0, scanY);\\n ctx.lineTo(canvas.width, scanY);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n\\n time += 0.02;\\n animationId = requestAnimationFrame(drawRGBScene);\\n };\\n\\n drawRGBScene();\\n\\n return () => {\\n cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);\\n };\\n }, [isActive]);\\n\\n return (\\n
\\n
\\n \\n RGB CAMERA\\n {isActive && (\\n
\\n )}\\n
\\n \\n
\\n );\\n}\\n\"}"}

{"toolCallId":"tooluse_pB3JQoahUKl93gxuVKVuka","toolName":"write_tool","argsJson":"{\"path\":\"/src/app/components/DepthView.tsx\",\"file_text\":\"import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';\\nimport { Scan } from 'lucide-react';\\n\\ninterface DepthViewProps {\\n isActive: boolean;\\n}\\n\\nexport function DepthView({ isActive }: DepthViewProps) {\\n const canvasRef = useRef(null);\\n\\n useEffect(() => {\\n if (!isActive || !canvasRef.current) return;\\n\\n const canvas = canvasRef.current;\\n const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\\n if (!ctx) return;\\n\\n let animationId: number;\\n let time = 0;\\n\\n const drawDepthMap = () => {\\n // Background\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#000000';\\n ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\\n\\n // Create depth map effect\\n const centerX = canvas.width / 2;\\n const centerY = canvas.height / 2;\\n\\n // Draw depth gradient for objects\\n const drawDepthObject = (x: number, y: number, size: number, depth: number) => {\\n const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient(x, y, 0, x, y, size);\\n const intensity = Math.floor(255 * (1 - depth));\\n gradient.addColorStop(0, `rgb(${intensity}, ${intensity}, ${intensity})`);\\n gradient.addColorStop(1, `rgb(${Math.floor(intensity * 0.3)}, ${Math.floor(intensity * 0.3)}, ${Math.floor(intensity * 0.3)})`);\\n ctx.fillStyle = gradient;\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);\\n ctx.fill();\\n };\\n\\n // Object 1 - Close (bright)\\n const obj1Depth = 0.3 + Math.sin(time * 0.5) * 0.1;\\n drawDepthObject(\\n centerX - 80 + Math.sin(time * 0.5) * 10,\\n centerY - 60,\\n 40,\\n obj1Depth\\n );\\n\\n // Object 2 - Medium distance\\n const obj2Depth = 0.5 + Math.cos(time * 0.7) * 0.1;\\n drawDepthObject(\\n centerX + 50 + Math.cos(time * 0.7) * 10,\\n centerY - 30,\\n 35,\\n obj2Depth\\n );\\n\\n // Object 3 - Far (darker)\\n const obj3Depth = 0.7 + Math.sin(time * 0.3) * 0.1;\\n drawDepthObject(\\n centerX - 20,\\n centerY + 60 + Math.sin(time * 0.3) * 5,\\n 30,\\n obj3Depth\\n );\\n\\n // Add noise for realistic depth sensor effect\\n const imageData = ctx.getImageData(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\\n const data = imageData.data;\\n for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i += 4) {\\n const noise = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10;\\n data[i] = Math.max(0, Math.min(255, data[i] + noise));\\n data[i + 1] = Math.max(0, Math.min(255, data[i + 1] + noise));\\n data[i + 2] = Math.max(0, Math.min(255, data[i + 2] + noise));\\n }\\n ctx.putImageData(imageData, 0, 0);\\n\\n // Depth scale indicator\\n const scaleWidth = 20;\\n const scaleHeight = canvas.height - 60;\\n const scaleX = canvas.width - 40;\\n const scaleY = 30;\\n\\n for (let i = 0; i < scaleHeight; i++) {\\n const intensity = Math.floor((i / scaleHeight) * 255);\\n ctx.fillStyle = `rgb(${intensity}, ${intensity}, ${intensity})`;\\n ctx.fillRect(scaleX, scaleY + i, scaleWidth, 1);\\n }\\n\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#ffffff';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 1;\\n ctx.strokeRect(scaleX, scaleY, scaleWidth, scaleHeight);\\n\\n // Labels\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';\\n ctx.font = '10px monospace';\\n ctx.fillText('NEAR', scaleX - 35, scaleY + 5);\\n ctx.fillText('FAR', scaleX - 30, scaleY + scaleHeight);\\n\\n time += 0.02;\\n animationId = requestAnimationFrame(drawDepthMap);\\n };\\n\\n drawDepthMap();\\n\\n return () => {\\n cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);\\n };\\n }, [isActive]);\\n\\n return (\\n
\\n
\\n \\n DEPTH SENSOR\\n {isActive && (\\n
\\n )}\\n
\\n \\n
\\n );\\n}\\n\"}"}

{"toolCallId":"tooluse_BTbfZvfj6IM2GzhqVjwnGy","toolName":"write_tool","argsJson":"{\"path\":\"/src/app/components/PointCloudView.tsx\",\"file_text\":\"import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';\\nimport { Box } from 'lucide-react';\\n\\ninterface PointCloudViewProps {\\n isActive: boolean;\\n}\\n\\ninterface Point3D {\\n x: number;\\n y: number;\\n z: number;\\n color: string;\\n}\\n\\nexport function PointCloudView({ isActive }: PointCloudViewProps) {\\n const canvasRef = useRef(null);\\n\\n useEffect(() => {\\n if (!isActive || !canvasRef.current) return;\\n\\n const canvas = canvasRef.current;\\n const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');\\n if (!ctx) return;\\n\\n let animationId: number;\\n let rotation = 0;\\n\\n // Generate point cloud data\\n const points: Point3D[] = [];\\n const gridSize = 10;\\n const spacing = 20;\\n\\n // Create three objects as point clouds\\n // Object 1 - Cube\\n for (let x = -2; x <= 2; x++) {\\n for (let y = -2; y <= 2; y++) {\\n for (let z = -2; z <= 2; z++) {\\n if (Math.abs(x) === 2 || Math.abs(y) === 2 || Math.abs(z) === 2) {\\n points.push({\\n x: x * spacing - 100,\\n y: y * spacing - 80,\\n z: z * spacing,\\n color: '#3b82f6'\\n });\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n\\n // Object 2 - Sphere\\n for (let i = 0; i < 150; i++) {\\n const theta = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;\\n const phi = Math.random() * Math.PI;\\n const r = 40;\\n points.push({\\n x: r * Math.sin(phi) * Math.cos(theta) + 60,\\n y: r * Math.sin(phi) * Math.sin(theta) - 40,\\n z: r * Math.cos(phi),\\n color: '#10b981'\\n });\\n }\\n\\n // Object 3 - Random cluster\\n for (let i = 0; i < 100; i++) {\\n points.push({\\n x: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 60 - 30,\\n y: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 60 + 80,\\n z: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 60,\\n color: '#ef4444'\\n });\\n }\\n\\n const drawPointCloud = () => {\\n // Clear canvas\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#000000';\\n ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);\\n\\n // Draw grid\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#1e293b';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 1;\\n const gridSpacing = 40;\\n for (let i = 0; i < canvas.width; i += gridSpacing) {\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(i, 0);\\n ctx.lineTo(i, canvas.height);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n }\\n for (let i = 0; i < canvas.height; i += gridSpacing) {\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(0, i);\\n ctx.lineTo(canvas.width, i);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n }\\n\\n // Sort points by depth for proper rendering\\n const rotatedPoints = points.map(p => {\\n const cosR = Math.cos(rotation);\\n const sinR = Math.sin(rotation);\\n const x = p.x * cosR - p.z * sinR;\\n const z = p.x * sinR + p.z * cosR;\\n const y = p.y;\\n return { x, y, z, color: p.color };\\n });\\n\\n rotatedPoints.sort((a, b) => b.z - a.z);\\n\\n // Project and draw points\\n const centerX = canvas.width / 2;\\n const centerY = canvas.height / 2;\\n const scale = 2;\\n const perspective = 400;\\n\\n rotatedPoints.forEach(p => {\\n const scale3d = perspective / (perspective + p.z);\\n const x2d = centerX + p.x * scale3d * scale;\\n const y2d = centerY + p.y * scale3d * scale;\\n\\n // Point size based on depth\\n const size = Math.max(1, 3 * scale3d);\\n\\n // Color intensity based on depth\\n const depth = (p.z + 200) / 400;\\n const alpha = Math.max(0.3, Math.min(1, depth));\\n\\n ctx.fillStyle = p.color;\\n ctx.globalAlpha = alpha;\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.arc(x2d, y2d, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);\\n ctx.fill();\\n });\\n\\n ctx.globalAlpha = 1;\\n\\n // Draw axes\\n const axisLength = 80;\\n const axisScale = perspective / (perspective + 0);\\n\\n // X axis - Red\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#ef4444';\\n ctx.lineWidth = 2;\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(centerX, centerY);\\n const xEnd = centerX + axisLength * Math.cos(rotation) * axisScale * scale;\\n const xEndZ = axisLength * Math.sin(rotation);\\n const xScale = perspective / (perspective + xEndZ);\\n ctx.lineTo(centerX + axisLength * Math.cos(rotation) * xScale * scale, centerY);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n\\n // Y axis - Green\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#10b981';\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(centerX, centerY);\\n ctx.lineTo(centerX, centerY - axisLength * axisScale * scale);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n\\n // Z axis - Blue\\n ctx.strokeStyle = '#3b82f6';\\n ctx.beginPath();\\n ctx.moveTo(centerX, centerY);\\n ctx.lineTo(centerX - axisLength * Math.sin(rotation) * axisScale * scale, centerY);\\n ctx.stroke();\\n\\n // Point count\\n ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';\\n ctx.font = '12px monospace';\\n ctx.fillText(`ç¹æ°: ${points.length}`, 10, canvas.height - 10);\\n\\n rotation += 0.01;\\n animationId = requestAnimationFrame(drawPointCloud);\\n };\\n\\n drawPointCloud();\\n\\n return () => {\\n cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);\\n };\\n }, [isActive]);\\n\\n return (\\n
\\n
\\n \\n POINT CLOUD\\n {isActive && (\\n
\\n )}\\n
\\n \\n
\\n );\\n}\\n\"}"}
